statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' AND satisfaction_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 ORDER BY feedback_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_owner FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_owner = 'Marketing Team';
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 2
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_owner FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, effectiveness_rating FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 8;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, effectiveness_rating FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, f.feedback_text FROM Customer c INNER JOIN CustomerFeedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackResponse ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT f.feedback_text, c.customer_name FROM CustomerFeedback f JOIN Customer c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE f.rating > 4 ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT f.feedback_id, f.rating, fr.response_text FROM CustomerFeedback f LEFT JOIN FeedbackResponse fr ON f.feedback_id = fr.feedback_id WHERE fr.response_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY f.feedback_id ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, fs.strategy_name FROM Customer c, MarketingStrategy fs WHERE c.customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND fs.strategy_id < 5 ORDER BY fs.strategy_id ASC;

SELECT f.feedback_id, COUNT(fr.response_id) AS response_count FROM CustomerFeedback f LEFT JOIN FeedbackResponse fr ON f.feedback_id = fr.feedback_id GROUP BY f.feedback_id HAVING response_count > 1 ORDER BY response_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT segment_name, criteria->>'age' AS age_criteria FROM CustomerSegments WHERE criteria @> '{"age": "18-30"}' ORDER BY segment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM CustomerSegments WHERE criteria @> '{"age": 30}' ORDER BY segment_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment, keywords FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
